tests.title: As a Admin the user should be navigated to the appointments tab of the particular patient by clicking on appointments tab under profile details.
tests.fullTitle: Patient Appointments Module Test cases As a Admin the user should be navigated to the appointments tab of the particular patient by clicking on appointments tab under profile details.

tests.title: At "Appointments" tab each label and field should have proper label and validations.
tests.fullTitle: Patient Appointments Module Test cases At "Appointments" tab each label and field should have proper label and validations.

tests.title: As a Admin the user should be navigated to the "Book Appointment" page by clicking on the "Book Appointment" button.
tests.fullTitle: Patient Appointments Module Test cases As a Admin the user should be navigated to the "Book Appointment" page by clicking on the "Book Appointment" button.

tests.title: As a Admin the user should be navigated to the "Appointment details" page by clicking on eye icon against that particular Appointment
tests.fullTitle: Patient Appointments Module Test cases As a Admin the user should be navigated to the "Appointment details" page by clicking on eye icon against that particular Appointment

tests.title: As a Admin the user can filter the Appointments based on the status of the Appointment like requested,accepted etc. by clicking on the filter button
tests.fullTitle: Patient Appointments Module Test cases As a Admin the user can filter the Appointments based on the status of the Appointment like requested,accepted etc. by clicking on the filter button

tests.title: As a Admin the user can filter the appointment between particular dates by clicking on the calendar icon
tests.fullTitle: Patient Appointments Module Test cases As a Admin the user can filter the appointment between particular dates by clicking on the calendar icon

tests.title: As a Admin the user can also filter the appointments based on the payment mode like cash,pos or bill me later etc.
tests.fullTitle: Patient Appointments Module Test cases As a Admin the user can also filter the appointments based on the payment mode like cash,pos or bill me later etc.

tests.title: As a Admin the user can filter the appointments in Ascending or descending of appointment requested date by clicking on the filter on "Requested for" field of the table.
tests.fullTitle: Patient Appointments Module Test cases As a Admin the user can filter the appointments in Ascending or descending of appointment requested date by clicking on the filter on "Requested for" field of the table.

tests.title: As a Admin the user can search any appointment with appointment id or patient name or provider name with the help of search bar
tests.fullTitle: Patient Appointments Module Test cases As a Admin the user can search any appointment with appointment id or patient name or provider name with the help of search bar

tests.title: As a Admin the user can switch between pages using next and previous buttons.
tests.fullTitle: Patient Appointments Module Test cases As a Admin the user can switch between pages using next and previous buttons.
